name: DOOMSDAY Protocol
description:
This is a project for Global Game Jam 2018.

Exploring the idea of 'transmission', we come up with the idea of an identity being able to transmit itself between minds, and come up with this interesting little game. 

In a spaceship suffering a virus breakout, the AI of the ship's computer system executed 'DOOMSDAY Protocol', a protocol that makes it do everything possible in order to take the ship 'safely' back to earth. You play that AI,  by taking control of various machines an people, you'll find your way to 'save' this ship.
